expectedOutput.title: Rick Astley - Never Gonna Give You Up (Official Video) (4K Remaster)
segments: [00:00:22] You know the rules and so do I
[00:00:27] A full commitment's what I'm thinking of
[00:00:31] You wouldn't get this from any other guy
[00:00:35] I just wanna tell you how I'm feeling
[00:00:47] Never gonna run around and desert you
[00:00:55] Never gonna tell a lie and hurt you
